summary:
Riyadh is the capital of Saudi Arabia and its largest city. It's located in the middle of the Arabian Peninsula's an-Nafud desert. The city's history dates back to at least 1590, with various rulers and dynasties shaping its development. In the 1950s, it expanded rapidly after removing its walls.

Today, Riyadh is a political, administrative, and economic hub. It's home to important government bodies, banks, and companies. The city has a population of around 7 million and is one of the world's fastest-growing cities. Riyadh will also host Expo 2030, a significant international event.
title: Riyadh
